name: Banini: Legend of Alec
description:
Things have been quiet since Alec the Alligator beat the tar out of your old boss Daron Bante and rescued the adorable (but just the worst) Garbo people. Daron Bante’s loss was so pathetic, his whole army of Baninis, including you, quit on the spot and moved on with their lives. 

So none of you were expecting Alec to burst into the pub and beg for your help. Daron Bante has found Alec’s long-lost parents, and is holding them hostage. The only way he’ll release them is if Alec delivers King Robbie (his adopted Garbo father) in return.

So it’s up to you! Break back into Daron Bante’s lair on Isle Purgatory, beat his newly hired minions, and set these formerly absent alligator parents free. 

This is a Troika adventure inspired by Croc: Legend of the Gobbos, and includes a customizable adventure, six brand-new backgrounds, an alternate initiative system that uses music instead of dice, and plenty of good feelings all around!

Made for the Troika! Pamphlet Adventure Jam.

Banini: The Legend of Alec is an independent production of Christopher W. Reynolds & NinjaHELL! Productions.  It is not affiliated with the Melsonian Arts Council.
